Title: Episode #1.6
Writer: Rob Delaney (created and written by), Sharon Horgan (created and written by)
Actors: Sharon Horgan, Rob Delaney, Ashley Jensen, Mark Bonnar
Plot: Fergal is delighted to act as Rob's best man but he is also permanently drunk, his wife having left him, whilst Sharon's maid of honour Kate is annoyingly excitable and gets lost on the hen...
